material_relation_unit = #{item.materialRelationUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_minpackage_amt = #{item.materialMinpackageAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
material_minpackage_type = #{item.materialMinpackageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_tax_price = #{item.materialTaxPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
material_vat_price = #{item.materialVatPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

level_bom_code = #{item.levelBomCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
material_supply_mode = #{item.materialSupplyMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

`length` = #{item.length,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
width = #{item.width,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update_time = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%m%S')
where material_order_code = #{item.materialOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND material_code = #{item.materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
